name: Totem Shoot 'Em
description:
A 3D physics based Shoot 'Em Up game!

Shoot down wobbling stacks of enemy totems, blow up big piles of TNT and upgrade your weapons in this unique twist of the shoot 'em up genre. 

Hundreds of intense levels, each with several action packed rooms.

• BEAUTIFUL 3D-graphics!
• AMAZING physics!
• SHOOT DOWN tall stacks of enemies!
• UPGRADE your weapons!
• BLOW UP TNT to wreak havoc!
• HIDE behind obstacles to avoid getting shot!
• PUSH stacks of stone and wood to change the level!
• DESTRUCTIBLE environment!


---

Support: https://valasmedia.com/support

Privacy Notice: https://valasmedia.com/privacy

Please note: This game is free to play and download but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Notice, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download this game.
